meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used as an antibacterial agent.
meanings.sent1: The sulfanilamide helped fight off the bacteria in the wound.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe sulfanilamide to treat infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were so scared of the sulfanilamide, they ran away!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like sulfanilamide, fighting off any negativity.
meanings.sent5: The sulfanilamide was like a brave soldier battling the bacteria invaders.

meanings.definition: A synthetic compound derived from aniline and used in the treatment of bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The sulfanilamide medicine was effective in curing the infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed sulfanilamide to help fight the bacterial illness.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but sulfanilamide crashed it!
meanings.sent4: Her love was like sulfanilamide, healing his wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The sulfanilamide worked tirelessly to defeat the bacterial army in his body.
